https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/my6y4bT7OaCnYukyLvAqbi7zWFg.jpg The blood-soaked tale of a Norse warrior's battle against the great and murderous troll, Grendel. Heads will roll. Out of allegiance to the King Hrothgar, the much respected Lord of the Danes, Beowulf leads a troop of warriors across the sea to rid a village of the marauding monster. Beowulf & Grendel
